forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by mostly cloudy skies and gusty winds this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early then periods of showers late. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers after midnight. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
